name: Katharine Hepburn Movies Quiz | Katharine Hepburn | 10 Questions

questions.text: In 'Adam's Rib', Hepburn and frequent co-star Spencer Tracy portray ...?
questions.explanation:
Lawyers.

	They are lawyers on opposite sides of a case.

questions.text: Hepburn starred in 'The Philadelphia Story'. Who wrote the play?
questions.explanation:
Philip Barry.

	Cary Grant and James Stewart, too.

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a Tracy and Hepburn Movie?
questions.explanation:
'Written on the Wind'.

	That was a drama with Bacall and Rock Hudson.

questions.text: Who co-starred with Hepburn in 'On Golden Pond'?
In 'Keeper of the Flame' Hepburn keeps a secret about her famous husband. What is it?
questions.explanation:
Political Views.

	The 'hero' actually had turned to fascism.

questions.text: Hepburn starred in 'The Lion in Winter'. Who played the 'lion'?
In 'Guess Who's Coming To Dinner' the 'who' refers to Sidney Poitier's parents. Who else attends the dinner?
questions.explanation:
Clergyman.

	Tracy's good friend also attends.

questions.text: Hepburn also starred in 'Rooster Cogburn'. Who played the title role?
questions.explanation:
John Wayne.

	The sequel to 'True Grit'. Bogart, of course, was in 'African Queen'.

questions.text: In 'Woman of the Year', Hepburn is a famous woman. What does her husband - Spencer Tracy - do for a living?
'Bringing Up Baby' is considered to be one of the best 'screwball comedies'. Who was the director?
